Articles.Content:
I've been lookin through the forums and haven't seen alot about cruisers and frigates. So I'm making this thread so people who want to share their GIANT spaceships can ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) !!!! They also can be NON-STOCK!!!! 

Also remember to have a link ( if you want )

Here's mine 

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/tDwGk)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-06T19:54:33Z" title="06/06/2015 07:54  PM" data-short="9 yr">June 6, 2015</time> by Djslime6764**

[The largest repository in all the land](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/25376-Showcase-KIDI-Kerbal-Interplanetary-Defence-Initiative)

[Bigger but arguable if it counts](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/37169-Spiritwolf-Hanland-Submissions)
